synopsis.p: Split sections into several sections according to annotations boundaries.

description.p: creates a new section for each annotation in selectLayer. The created sections will have the same name as the section to which the annotation belongs.
Creates a copy of annotations in other layers in the new section. Relation and tuples are also cloned.
optionally creates a new document for each created section if splitDocuments is set.

param-doc.name: croppedAnnotationFeature
param-doc.p: If an annotation is cropped in the process of cloning, then this feature is set to true.

param-doc.name: docId
param-doc.p: Identifier of created documents if splitDocuments is set.

param-doc.name: mergeOverlapping
param-doc.p: Merge overlapping annotations in selectLayer before creating sections.

param-doc.name: selectLayer
param-doc.p: Layer where to find annotations that specify the created sections contents.

param-doc.name: splitDocuments
param-doc.p: If set, the creates a new document for each created section.
